name: The Druid (Ste, rasok, Fogheart, ADDlCT, Kosmos, Bran024)
name_original: The Druid (Ste, rasok, Fogheart, ADDlCT, Kosmos, Bran024)
description:
A game about a lone druid tasked to heal the world 

Currently the game is a prototype 
- we had big plans and little time, but also a lot of fun
the plan is to expand the game post jam to include all the awesome art we haven't been able to add in and also to make the game, well, finishable.
